text: Michael Chadbourne Mills (born March 20, 1966)Family Tree Legends Michael C. Mills, Alameda County is an American movie director from Berkeley, California. He is also a writer and graphic designer. He is best known for his independent movies, Beginners (2010) and 20th Century Women (2016). ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from California Category:Writers from Berkeley, California Category:Screenwriters from California
title: Mike Mills (director)
